 2019-14032019-12-19,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActOfficial Residences Act
SubjectRoger Charbonneau ** Salary Increase **
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of ROGER CHARBONNEAU, House Manager at the Prime Minister's official residence, effective April 1, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
